creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: two peasants carry a parcel down a narrow path towards a village; to the R, two peasants work in rice fields amongst tall bales; three other travelers at the end of the trail; village rooftops, scraggly trees, and mountains in background
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

title: Ishiyakushi, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
